changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE PROCEDURE DataValidation.UpdateAvailability @TicketId varchar(36), @IsAvailable char(1), @SuccessfulUpdate int OUTPUT AS BEGIN
SET @SuccessfulUpdate = 0
IF EXISTS( SELECT Id FROM DataValidation.Tickets WHERE Id = @TicketId ) BEGIN
UPDATE DataValidation.Tickets SET ResultsAreAvailable = @IsAvailable WHERE Id = @TicketId
IF @@ROWCOUNT > 0 SET @SuccessfulUpdate = 1
END ELSE BEGIN
SET @SuccessfulUpdate = 1
INSERT INTO DataValidation.Tickets ( FacilityId, Id, ResultsAreAvailable, InitiatedOnDate, TicketTypeId ) VALUES ( 999, @TicketId, @IsAvailable, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0 )
END
END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON DataValidation.UpdateAvailability TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON DataValidation.UpdateAvailability FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE DataValidation.UpdateAvailability;
